summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4673 for the improvement of the alley in block 8, 1st Subdivision Washington Park Addition, from East Ward Street to East Prospect Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54227, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
